issue.title: [CI][R] Update R dependencies for Conda build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7024](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7024). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Conda makes you keep a separate list of package dependencies and install them differently from how R normally does this, so when adding an R dependency, you have to add it there too.
